00042         template<class ThreadingModel = SingleThreadModel>
00043         class ComRootObject
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 virtual ~ComRootObject() { }
00047 
00049                 static const guid& _get_uuid();
00050 
00051         protected:      
00053 
00054                 static unsigned long _AddRef(long& refCount) 
00055                 {
00056                         ThreadingModel::Increment(refCount);
00057                         return refCount;
00058                 }
00059 
00061 
00062                 static unsigned long _Release(long& refCount)
00063                 {
00064                         assert(refCount > 0);
00065                         ThreadingModel::Decrement(refCount);
00066                         return refCount;
00067                 }
00068         };

00076         template <class T>
00077         class NOVTABLE ComClassFactory : 
00078                 public ComRootObject<>, 
00079                 public IClassFactory
00080         {
00081         public:
00083                 typedef ComClassFactory _ThisClass;
00084 
00085                 BEGIN_INTERFACE_MAP()
00086                         INTERFACE_ENTRY(IClassFactory)
00087                 END_INTERFACE_MAP()
00088 
00090                 HResult CreateInstance(SF_RIID riid, void** ppvObj)
00091                 {
00092                         return T::_CreateInstance(riid, ppvObj);
00093                 }
00094         };
00095

00101 
00106         template <class T>
00107         class NOVTABLE ComClassFactorySingleton : 
00108                 public ComRootObject<>, 
00109                 public IClassFactory
00110         {
00111         public:
00113                 typedef ComClassFactorySingleton _ThisClass;
00114 
00115                 BEGIN_INTERFACE_MAP()
00116                         INTERFACE_ENTRY(IClassFactory)
00117                 END_INTERFACE_MAP()
00118 
00120                 ComClassFactorySingleton() : pCached(0)
00121                 {
00122                 }
00123 
00125                 virtual ~ComClassFactorySingleton()
00126                 {
00127                         if(pCached)
00128                                 pCached->Release();
00129                 }
00130 
00132                 HResult CreateInstance(SF_RIID riid, void** ppvObj)
00133                 {
00134                         if(!pCached)
00135                         {
00136                                 HResult hr = T::_CreateInstance(uuid_of(IUnknown), (void**)&pCached);
00137                                 if(SF_FAILED(hr))
00138                                         return hr;
00139                         }
00140                         return pCached->QueryInterface(riid, ppvObj);
00141                 }
00142 
00143         private:
00145                 IUnknown *pCached;
00146         };

00151         namespace detail
00152         {
00154 
00158                 template<typename Base, template<typename> class Alloc = new_allocator>
00159                 class ComObject : public Base
00160                 {
00161                 public:
00162 
00163                         typedef ComObject<Base, Alloc>  _thisType;
00164                         typedef Alloc<_thisType>                allocator;
00165 
00167                         ComObject() : mRefCount(0)
00168                         {
00169                         }
00170 
00172                         unsigned long AddRef() 
00173                         {
00174                                 return Base::_AddRef(mRefCount);
00175                         }
00176 
00178                         unsigned long Release() 
00179                         {
00180                                 unsigned long t = Base::_Release(mRefCount);
00181                                 if(!t)
00182                                 {
00183                                         allocator alloc;
00184                                         alloc.destroy(this);
00185                                         alloc.deallocate(this, 1);
00186                                 }
00187                                 return t;
00188                         }
00189 
00191                         static _thisType* _CreateInstance()
00192                         {
00193                                 allocator alloc;
00194                                 _thisType* p = alloc.allocate(1);
00195                                 new(p) _thisType();
00196                                 return p;
00197                         }
00198 
00200                         static HResult _CreateInstance(SF_RIID riid, void** ppv)
00201                         {
00202                                 if (ppv == 0) return SF_E_POINTER;
00203                                 *ppv = 0;
00204 
00205                                 HResult hRes = SF_E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00206                                 _thisType* p = 0;
00207 
00208                                 p = _CreateInstance();
00209 
00210                                 if (p != 0)
00211                                 {
00212                                         p->AddRef();
00213                                         hRes = p->QueryInterface(riid, ppv);
00214                                         p->Release();
00215                                 }
00216                                 return hRes;
00217                         }
00218 
00219 
00220                 private:
00222                         long mRefCount;
00223                 };
00224 
00226 
00227         } // detail
00228 
00229 } // namespace

00235 
00236 template<class Impl>
00237 module::HResult create_instance_impl(Impl** pp)
00238 {
00239         if(!pp) return SF_E_POINTER;
00240         *pp = 0;
00241 
00242         typename Impl::_ObjectClass * pImpl = Impl::_ObjectClass::_CreateInstance();
00243         if(!pImpl) return SF_E_FAIL;
00244 
00245         pImpl->AddRef();
00246         *pp = pImpl;
00247         return SF_S_OK;
00248 }
00249 
00251 
00252 
00254 
00255 template<class Impl, class Itf>
00256 module::HResult create_instance(Itf** pp)
00257 {
00258         // NOTE: if you get an ambiguity error here
00259         // then you have tried to call create_instance to
00260         // create implementation class - use create_instance_impl instead
00261         return Impl::_ObjectClass::_CreateInstance(UUID_PPV(Itf, pp));
00262 }
00263 
00265 
00266 template<class Impl>
00267 module::HResult create_instance(void** pp, SF_RIID iid)
00268 {
00269         return Impl::_ObjectClass::_CreateInstance(iid, pp);
00270 }
